The sizes could be off...they are not always the greatest this far along in pregnancy.  They told my friend that her baby was going to be over 9lbs based on measurements and he was 7 lbs and a few oz.

Even if it was 15.7 ounces, that is still too small. I hope that everything works out, but extremely small babies often turn out to have some type of dwarfism or other medical problems. Keep in mind that ultrasounds have room for error, especially if it was not done by someone experienced in OB ultrasounds.
